name: Prequel(Sonny Digital)
content: I pull up in a ride that's so loud
All I do is grind all I do is shine
All I do is take my time take my place
Had to f**k your b***h had to grow
Some w**d had to get some dough
I pull up in a ride that's so loud
The second switch I hit'll make
My bad b***h drop it low
I pull up in a ride that's so loud
